content:
Sure, here's the updated pricing list:

* Audiovisual Portions: $800
	+ Includes: Visual Portion and Audio Portion, and a 20-30 minute video
* Visual Portion: $400 (included in Audiovisual Portions)
	+ Includes: 4 revisions
* Audio Portion: $400 (included in Audiovisual Portions)
* Additional revisions: $100 each

Total: $1,200 (for 4 revisions)

Note: Additional revisions beyond the 4 included in the Visual Portion will incur additional costs.
